ygData.subject: Extremely P.O.'d
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I am really bloody Mad now. I was contacted In-game by these morons last night, after getting my character back. They seemed to have known about my
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I am really bloody Mad now. I was contacted In-game by these morons last
night, after getting my character back. They seemed to have known about my
"accident" and then offered to sell me, buy things from me over the net with
real money (hackles raise) http://www.global-ent-services.com/eq.htm



To top it all off, they live close to me in Michigan.



How did they know my character was deleted? And then they have the nerve to
ask me to buy things from them with a credit card!



I can not, and will not stand for having to buy things with real money for
an online game! Nothing upsets me more than people who FARM items to sell on
Ebay, or whatever or wherever they sell. Get a damn job. Don't rob me of
having fun in an online game so you can make a damn profit!



I cannot even gather my thoughts, I am so mad.



Any thoughts are appreciated. This is just wrong, in my opinion.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
